vocabularyItems.english: The factory produces thousands of cars every single month here.
We store all our products in a large warehouse facility.
Scientists conduct important experiments in the research laboratory daily.
The carpenter has a small workshop behind his house.
The artist paints beautiful pictures in her private studio.
The dental clinic opens at nine o'clock every morning.
You can buy medicine at the pharmacy across the street.
The bakery sells fresh bread and delicious pastries every day.
I buy fresh meat from the local butcher shop weekly.
The grocery store has a wide variety of food items.
She owns a fashionable boutique in the shopping district downtown.
I get my hair cut at the beauty salon monthly.
I take my clothes to the laundry service every week.
The mechanic fixed my car at the garage yesterday afternoon.
We bought our new car from the dealership last month.
The furniture showroom displays beautiful sofas and tables for sale.
The company headquarters is located in New York City.
Our bank has many branches throughout the entire country.
The factory outlet sells products at discounted prices always.
I bought a newspaper from the kiosk at the station.
The market has many stalls selling fresh vegetables and fruits.
We set up a booth at the trade fair.
Please pay at the counter before leaving the store.
The hotel lobby is beautifully decorated with modern furniture.
Walk down the long corridor to reach the meeting room.
The hallway connects all the offices on this floor.
Use the staircase if the elevator is not working.
Take the elevator to the tenth floor please quickly.
The escalator takes you to the second floor easily.
The parking lot is located in the basement level.
We store old furniture in the dusty attic upstairs.
The rooftop restaurant offers amazing views of the city.
We have breakfast on the sunny terrace every morning.
The balcony overlooks the beautiful garden below our apartment.
Children play safely in the courtyard between the buildings.
The shopping plaza has many stores and restaurants together.
The town square is the center of community activities.
The marketplace is very crowded on Saturday mornings always.
The financial district has many banks and office buildings.
This neighborhood is very safe and friendly for families.
Many people live in the suburbs outside the city.
Downtown is always busy with people and traffic during daytime.
The uptown area has expensive shops and luxury apartments.
They live on the outskirts of the city near farmland.
There are several schools in the vicinity of our house.
This locality is known for its excellent restaurants and cafes.
This is a residential zone with no commercial buildings.
The technology sector is growing rapidly in this region.
Smoking is not allowed on the premises of building.
The sports facility has a gym and swimming pool.
The apartment complex has over two hundred units total.
The embassy compound is heavily guarded for security purposes.
They own a large estate in the countryside with land.
This property is worth over one million dollars today.
The construction site is very noisy during working hours.
The wedding venue can accommodate three hundred guests comfortably.
The school auditorium holds five hundred people for events.
The sports arena hosts basketball games every weekend regularly.
The football stadium can seat fifty thousand fans at once.
We had lunch in the garden pavilion yesterday afternoon.
The office canteen serves lunch from twelve to two.
Students eat in the school cafeteria during lunch break.
The executives meet in the boardroom every Monday morning.
Each employee has their own cubicle in the office.
My workstation has two monitors and a comfortable chair.
Please leave the documents on my desk before leaving.
The filing cabinet contains all our important business documents.
Old records are stored in the archive room downstairs.
The bank vault stores valuable items and money securely.
Put your belongings in the locker before swimming please.
Store your luggage in the overhead compartment on plane.
The council meets in the chamber every month regularly.
The staff quarters are located behind the main building.
Students live in the dormitory during the academic year.
The hostel provides cheap accommodation for travelers and backpackers.
We stayed at a cozy inn in the mountains.
The ski lodge is located at the base of mountain.
The beach resort has excellent facilities for families and children.
We stopped at a roadside motel for the night.
The guesthouse offers comfortable rooms at reasonable prices always.
They rent a small cottage by the lake every summer.
The wooden cabin is surrounded by tall pine trees.
The beach bungalow has a beautiful view of ocean.
We rented a luxury villa in Italy for vacation.
The old mansion has twenty rooms and a garden.
The penthouse apartment is on the top floor overlooking city.
They bought a condominium in the new development downtown recently.
The old tenement building needs renovation and repairs badly.
This dwelling has been occupied for over fifty years.
The ambassador's residence is a beautiful historic building downtown.
The forest is the natural habitat for many animals.
The ancient settlement was discovered by archaeologists last year.
The artist colony attracts creative people from around world.
This is a quiet residential enclave away from traffic.
My workplace is located in the downtown business district area.
I need a clean workspace to concentrate on tasks.
Wait in the foyer and someone will assist you.
Guests waited in the anteroom before the meeting started.
The vestibule connects the entrance to the main hall.
There is a small alcove with a reading chair.

liarGameData.explanation: A2 learners often confuse 'workplace' (the physical location where you work) with 'workspace' (the area/desk where you do your work).
liarGameData.practice: Workplace: 'My workplace is downtown' vs Workspace: 'I need a clean workspace to concentrate'
liarGameData.tip: Workplace = the building/company. Workspace = your desk/area within it.
